speaker: Menteith
text: The English power is near, led on by Malcolm,

speaker: Menteith
text: His uncle Siward, and the good Macduff.

speaker: Menteith
text: Revenges burn in them, for their dear causes

speaker: Menteith
text: Would to the bleeding and the grim alarm

speaker: Menteith
text: His pestered senses to recoil and start

speaker: Menteith
text: When all that is within him does condemn
